name: in-lite
0:
”Alexa, turn on light”
”Alexa, turn off all lights”
”Alexa, turn on big scope garage”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
in-lite skill to control your garden lights. Start by linking your in-lite account and your gardens will be connected to Alexa. This skill will then allow you to switch entire light zones or individual smart lights. Simply turn these on or off or control detailed and rich colors.

Connecting your skill to the outside world is done with the in-lite SMART BRIDGE. With this outside connection the in-lite skill for Amazon Alexa can control: SMART HUBs, SMART SCOPE TONE, SMART EVO FLEX and more products.
